attr.title: Goopty Goo
attr.desc: A game inspired by *The Floor is Lava* and squishing enemies in Mario games. After you stomp the first goo square in each room, you can't touch the floor until you have squished all the goo in that level.
attr.inst: Download the GooptyGooGame.zip version for free at itch.io (https://dylanbrowngames.itch.io/gooptygoo). Extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the *GooptyGooGame.zip* version for free at [itch.io](https://dylanbrowngames.itch.io/gooptygoo). Extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.
